R Installation Guide Francisco Rowe, Dani Arribas-Bel 2021-02-04 Purpose This resource provides step-by-step descriptions on how to install and run RStudio for ‘Spatial Modelling for Data Scientists’ from your own computer. Select your Operating System and follow the steps. A1 MacOS Installation A2 Linux Installation A3 Windows 10 Pro/Education A4 Windows 10 Home/pre-10 Need to find out your Windows version?
